jol.core
Class Runtime

java.lang.Object
  jol.core.Runtime
All Implemented Interfaces:
System
public class Runtime
extends java.lang.Object
implements System

The system runtime. Contains a reference to all state in an instance of the OverLog library. A call to the create(int) will create a new runtime object and run it in a separate thread. Implements the System interface through which outside programs interact with the OverLog library.
